item.description:
**I am being sent out of town for business this week, so I will not be able to make this event. Steve Lee, who is a nightlife member, will be the contact for this event. Be sure to look for him on Friday!

Steve can be reached by cell at 617.671.5310, and he will post a picture on his profile soon.**

Thank you for supporting this group, we plan on having many fun events this year! Charlie

Kick off 2006 in style!
First Friday of the month, 6:00-9:30 pm

Join us on the first Friday of every month in the majestic Koch Gallery for a spirited evening of socializing. Enjoy music, cocktails, friends new and old, and fine art. There is no other way to start the month!

Open to visitors twenty-one and older.

Museum Members: entry is FREE.
Non-Museum members: entry is FREE with Museum admission.

For more information, see http://www.mfa.org/ca...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: January Meetup - MFA First Friday 1/6/06
